## Status legend

### Overall

- ğŸŒˆğŸŒˆ: everything in â¶ğŸ’š + Single-Sign-On
- â¶ğŸ’š: upstream image, backups, email, healthcheck, integration testing
- â·ğŸ’›: upstream image, missing 1-2 items from â¶ğŸ’š
- â¸ğŸ: missing 3-4 items from â¶ğŸ’š or no upstream image
- â¹ğŸ’£: alpha

### Image

- â¶ğŸ’š: official upstream image
- â·ğŸ’›: semi-official / actively-maintained image
- â¸ğŸ: 3rd-party image
- â¹ğŸ’£: our own custom image

### Email

- â¶ğŸ’š: automatic (using environment variables)
- â·ğŸ’›: mostly automatic
- â¸ğŸ: manual
- âŒ: none

### CI

- â¶ğŸ’š: as â·ğŸ’›, plus healthcheck
- â·ğŸ’›: auto secrets + networks
- â¸ğŸ: basic deployment using `stack-ssh-deploy`, manual secrets + networks
- âŒ: none

### Single-Sign-On

- â¶ğŸ’š: automatic (using environment variables)
- â·ğŸ’›: mostly automatic
